name: Paper vs. Clay
description:
Use your brave paper vegetation to defend your base table from invading clay monsters. Collect paper, plant defenders and knead the opposition! Survive multiple waves and progress through levels.

A small knock-off of a classic tower defence game. Made as part of C# Unity Game Development course on Udemy.

Fonts: zai.tomasz.skowronski
Music: yulaslavdin
Sounds: yulaslavdin, _chelovek744_, lilyavek
